name: WoopWoopRun for Nicki Minaj
description:
Presented by Paper Boi App Life and Paper Boi Multimedia
HELP NICKI ESCAPE HER ECCENTRIC FANS WHILE SHE TWERKS AIMLESSLY ON Nicki Minaj:WOOP WOOP RUN!!!!
Players of the game take the role of twerking celebrities, reality stars, and models who are attempting to escape there awkward fans and needs YOU to guide them.
Begin by guiding Miley Pop as she runs from SPUD and twerks in the midst grabbing coins and various objects.
Run, jump, dash, slide, and twerk over and around various WACKY obstacles in this crazy new humourous endless running game!
Buy and upgrade loads of different power-ups and download your favorite celebrities. If you love shaking your derriere, then you’ll enjoy this hysterical game.
